Package edu.vt.middleware.servlet.filter

Class Summary
ByteArrayRequestWrapper HTTP servlet request wrapper that provides input streams and readers based on a byte array whose bytes were read from the wrapped request stream.
ByteArrayServletInputStream Implementation of ServletInputStream that is backed by a ByteArrayInputStream.
ClientCertFilter ClientCertFilter is a filter which can be used to restrict access to a servlet by verifying aspects of the client certificate chain given to the servlet.
RequestDumperFilter Example filter that dumps interesting state information about a request to the associated servlet context log file, before allowing the servlet to process the request in the usual way.
RequestMethodFilter RequestMethodFilter is a filter which can be used to restrict access to a servlet by using any of the methods available in javax.servlet.ServletRequest or javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest.
SessionAttributeFilter SessionAttributeFilter is a filter which can be used to redirect requests based on attributes found in the session.
